channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: They just went and tweeted it out. https://t.co/GOmLLGOubV
@JonathanCohn Hey, subject lines are *hard*
@TheBlueMeme @ratfink_maloney @jayrosen_nyu @jbenton I was accusing “Ratfink” of innocence for assuming the Times was acting out of obliviousness.

@froomkin @janecoaston The Times is the establishment. And the establishment has decided that Trumpism is preferable to racial and economic justice.
@froomkin @janecoaston The question is what are those who disagree going to do about it?
@yourfriendbird7 Nobody said to let them follow you back.

@ratfink_maloney @jayrosen_nyu @jbenton I love the smell of naive innocence in the morning.
@ratfink_maloney @jayrosen_nyu @jbenton They don’t want what happened to Hong Kong’s Apple to happen to them.
@ZacharyBraiterm Time for the ZOA to offer her the Manchin Prize for political courage.
@kampeas Still, it’s kind of sweet that he doesn’t know your long tenure on the feather-ruffling JTA poultry beat has ended and the pupik has been passed to @DrJackieMrsHajd
@swordsjew Good thing it’s been gamified! https://t.co/iHR7apFoh8

New album of Dylan covers coming soon. https://t.co/Q1XGWFniKj
Their version of “I Shall Be Released” was just released. Nice, but I prefer It in the original Yiddish. https://t.co/TYTS9c86Y8
@onthemainline Big if true.
@AkivaMCohen @sirenmonorail @IsaacAvilucea @EstebanHRZ @questauthority @Popehat All they have to do is figure out how to disrespect freedom of speech without abridging it.
@RachelFinston @HannahLebovits @hebrewnonsense Pretty sure they do need pizza. But they can eat it while learning Torah.
@dzkalman As it is written: “Don’t sweat the small stuff.”
@gilibugg @LilahSturges About what year was this proclamation?
@StarJews @AnnetteYReed Likewise for Rishonim and Achronik vis a vis the Talmud.
Underrated Ramchal subtweet. https://t.co/ta6MMAitBH

@espiers @delong I think we should accept that they don’t want one, and admit that @Sulliview’s idea of good journalism isn’t compatible with his thr Times understands its business model.
@espiers @delong @Sulliview Probably worth digging up the old critiques of mainstream media offered in the 60s in the Alternative Press and repurposing them.
@prof_dainy It’s not on their feed. And they have better design sense than this.
@FeldheimRejects So a sequel to this? https://t.co/hO8AsfPpf0
In which I try to one-up @ManischewitzCo https://t.co/vEdgbQLmia
@MisfitTorah @typolad Nobody talks about the time that Rav Moshe made a deal with Jimmy Carter to support Big Peanut in exchange for favorable Pell grant regulations.
@jamesdnicoll Isn’t approaching from an idiosyncratic angle central to the male reproductive system? So yes.
